name: Cincture of the Cosmic Deeps
data: It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The cincture stores a portion of certain offensive energies channeled
by the wearer. Looking at the cincture will show its current reserves.
The wearer can 'shoot' energy of a desired color at a target.
The cincture's reserves leak away over time.
